section.title: <h:panelGrid>: column classes are encoded in a wrong way
Description
section.para: The column classes of <h:panelGrid> are encoded in a wrong way: only the first <td> element in a table has the class specified in the "columnClasses" attribute.

section.title: How to reproduce
section.para: Place <h:panelGrid columns="3" columnClasses="cell"> on a page and specify styles for the .cell class. As the result only the first <td> in a table has this class.

section.title: Causes
section.para: It is a defect in JSF-RI 1.2.10 and JSF-RI 1.2_11.

section.title: Workarounds
section.para: The solution is to use as many "columnClasses" attributes as columns in the <h:panelGrid>.
